impulsive_venture_survey_10.Description: Do you like diving off the highboard?

impulsive_venture_survey_12.Description: Do you welcome new and exciting experiences and sensations even if they are a little frightening and unconventional?

impulsive_venture_survey_13.Description: Do you usually think carefully before doing anything?

impulsive_venture_survey_14.Description: Would you like to learn to fly an aeroplane?

impulsive_venture_survey_15.Description: Do you often do things on the spur of the moment?

impulsive_venture_survey_16.Description: Do you mostly speak before thinking things out?

impulsive_venture_survey_17.Description: Do you often get involved in things you later wish you could get out of?

impulsive_venture_survey_18.Description: Do you get so 'carried away' by new and exciting ideas. that you never think of possible snags?

impulsive_venture_survey_19.Description: Do you find it hard to understand people who risk their necks climbing mountains?

impulsive_venture_survey_20.Description: Do you sometimes like doing things that are a bit frightening?

impulsive_venture_survey_21.Description: Do you need to use a lot of self-control to keep out of trouble?

impulsive_venture_survey_22.Description: Would you agree that almost everything enjoyable is illegal or immoral?

impulsive_venture_survey_23.Description: Generally do you prefer to enter cold sea water gradually, to diving or jumping straight in?

impulsive_venture_survey_24.Description: Are you often surprised at people's reactions to what you do or say?

impulsive_venture_survey_25.Description: Would you enjoy the sensation of skiing very fast down a high mountain slope?

impulsive_venture_survey_26.Description: Do you think an evening out is more successful if it is unplanned or arranged at the last moment?

impulsive_venture_survey_27.Description: Would you like to go scuba diving?

impulsive_venture_survey_29.Description: Do you usually work quickly, without bothering to check?

impulsive_venture_survey_3.Description: Usually do you prefer to stick to brands you know are reliable to trying new ones on the chance of finding something better?

impulsive_venture_survey_30.Description: Do you often change your interests?

impulsive_venture_survey_31.Description: Before making up your mind, do you consider all the advantages and disadvantages?

impulsive_venture_survey_32.Description: Would you be put off a job involving quite a bit of danger?

impulsive_venture_survey_33.Description: Do you prefer to 'sleep on it' before making decisions?

impulsive_venture_survey_34.Description: When people shout at you, do you shout back?

impulsive_venture_survey_35.Description: Do you usually make up your mind quickly?

impulsive_venture_survey_4.Description: Do you quite enjoy taking risks?

impulsive_venture_survey_6.Description: Do you often buy things on impulse?

impulsive_venture_survey_7.Description: Do you generally do and say things without stopping to think?

impulsive_venture_survey_8.Description: Do you often get into a jam because you do things without thinking?

impulsive_venture_survey_9.Description: Do you think hitch-hiking is too dangerous a way to travel?
